alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Bexar; Frio; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 12:23AM CDT until June 03 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Frio County in south central Texas... Atascosa County in south central Texas... Southwestern Wilson County in south central Texas... Southwestern Bexar County in south central Texas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1222 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Leming to near Poteet to near Schattel, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pleasanton, Jourdanton, Poteet, Charlotte, Christine, Campbellton, Lytle, Somerset, Goldfinch, Leming, Schattel, Bigfoot, Iuka, Graytown, Kyote, Davis, Coughran, Dobrowolski, Amphion and Espey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
